name: Athletic World (Gameboy Demo)
description:
This is a demo rom of the game Athletic World for the original Gameboy (DMG). Inspired by a MSX classic from Konami. The full version will be released soon.

Run, jump and get the highest score possible!
The demo contains 2 stages with each 10 scenes.

-1 or 2 players;
-The scoreboard is saved;
-Super Game Boy compatible (2 joypads can be used for 2 players).

The game is playable on the itch.io html5 gameboy emulator. But for the best experience, download the rom and use a good emulator or flashcard.

Enjoy & Thanks for the support.
